content: That's a wonderful idea. I think I'll go with a set of twin-themed notecards with a mix of blank cards, thank-you cards, and milestone cards. I'm excited to put the gift basket together! By the way, speaking of babies, I was just thinking about how I've been seeing so many new additions in my life lately, and it's funny because I didn't even get to hold one of them, Oliver, in my arms - I only saw pictures of him on Mike's phone in May.
